mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score1,0)),2),0) as score1,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score2,0)),2),0) as score2, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score3,0)),2),0) as score3, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score4,0)),2),0) as score4, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score5,0)),2),0) as score5, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score6,0)),2),0) as score6,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score7,0)),2),0) as score7,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score8,0)),2),0) as score8, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score9,0)),2),0) as score9 FROM PROGRAM_SATISFACTION WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND AGE !=0

SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score1,0)),2),0) as score1,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score2,0)),2),0) as score2, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score3,0)),2),0) as score3, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score4,0)),2),0) as score4, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score5,0)),2),0) as score5,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score6,0)),2),0) as score6,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score7,0)),2),0) as score7,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score8,0)),2),0) as score8, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score9,0)),2) ,0)as score9,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score10,0)),2),0) as score10,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score11,0)),2),0) as score11,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score12,0)),2),0) as score12, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score13,0)),2),0) as score13,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score14,0)),2),0) as score14,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score15,0)),2),0) as score15,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score16,0)),2),0) as score16, ifnull(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score17,0)),2),0) as score17,IFNULL(ifnull(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score18,0)),2),0),0) as score18 FROM SERVICE_ENV_SATISFACTION WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND AGE !=0

SELECT NAME, SEX,AGE,RESIDENCE,JOB,PV, SCORE1,SCORE2,SCORE3,SCORE4,SCORE5,SCORE6,SCORE7,SCORE8,SCORE9,SCORE1,SCORE10, SCORE11,SCORE12,SCORE13,SCORE14,SCORE15,SCORE16,SCORE17,SCORE18,SCORE19,SCORE20,PTCPROGRAM,PAST_STRESS_EXPERIENCE, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2+ps.SCORE3)/3,1)as avg1,ROUND((ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5+ps.SCORE6)/3,1)as avg2,ROUND((ps.SCORE7+ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9+ps.SCORE10)/4,1)as avg3, ROUND((ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12)/2,1)as avg4,ROUND((ps.SCORE13+ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16+ps.SCORE17)/5,1) as avg5,ROUND((ps.SCORE18+ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE20)/3,1)as avg6 FROM PREVENT_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="사전" AND AGE !=0 ORDER BY NAME

SELECT NAME, SEX,AGE,RESIDENCE,JOB,PV, SCORE1,SCORE2,SCORE3,SCORE4,SCORE5,SCORE6,SCORE7,SCORE8,SCORE9,SCORE1,SCORE10, SCORE11,SCORE12,SCORE13,SCORE14,SCORE15,SCORE16,SCORE17,SCORE18,SCORE19,SCORE20,PTCPROGRAM,PAST_STRESS_EXPERIENCE, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2+ps.SCORE3)/3,1)as avg1,ROUND((ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5+ps.SCORE6)/3,1)as avg2,ROUND((ps.SCORE7+ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9+ps.SCORE10)/4,1)as avg3, ROUND((ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12)/2,1)as avg4,ROUND((ps.SCORE13+ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16+ps.SCORE17)/5,1) as avg5,ROUND((ps.SCORE18+ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE20)/3,1)as avg6 FROM PREVENT_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="사후" AND AGE !=0 ORDER BY NAME

SELECT ROUND(AVG(SCORE1),2) as score1,ROUND(AVG(SCORE2),2) as score2, ROUND(AVG(SCORE3),2) as score3, ROUND(AVG(SCORE4),2) as score4, ROUND(AVG(SCORE5),2) as score5,ROUND(AVG(SCORE6),2) as score6, ROUND(AVG(SCORE7),2) as score7,ROUND(AVG(SCORE8),2) as score8,ROUND(AVG(SCORE9),2) as score9,ROUND(AVG(SCORE10),2) as score10,ROUND(AVG(SCORE11),2) as score11,ROUND(AVG(SCORE12),2) as score12,ROUND(AVG(SCORE1),2) as score13, ROUND(AVG(SCORE14),2) as score14,ROUND(AVG(SCORE15),2) as score15,ROUND(AVG(SCORE16),2) as score16,ROUND(AVG(SCORE17),2) as score17,ROUND(AVG(SCORE18),2) as score18,ROUND(AVG(SCORE19),2) as score19 ,ROUND(AVG(SCORE20),2) as score20,ROUND((AVG(score1)+AVG(score2)+AVG(score3))/3,2)as avg1 ,ROUND((AVG(score6)+AVG(score4)+AVG(score5))/3,2)as avg2,ROUND((AVG(score10)+AVG(score7)+AVG(score8)+AVG(score9))/4,2)as avg3,ROUND((AVG(score11)+AVG(score12))/2,2)as avg4 ,ROUND((AVG(score17)+AVG(score13)+AVG(score14)+AVG(score15)+AVG(score16))/5,2)as avg5,ROUND((AVG(score18)+AVG(score20)+AVG(score19))/3,2)as avg6 FROM PREVENT_SERVICE WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="사전" AND AGE !=0 ORDER BY NAME

SELECT ROUND(AVG(SCORE1),2) as score1,ROUND(AVG(SCORE2),2) as score2, ROUND(AVG(SCORE3),2) as score3, ROUND(AVG(SCORE4),2) as score4, ROUND(AVG(SCORE5),2) as score5,ROUND(AVG(SCORE6),2) as score6, ROUND(AVG(SCORE7),2) as score7,ROUND(AVG(SCORE8),2) as score8,ROUND(AVG(SCORE9),2) as score9,ROUND(AVG(SCORE10),2) as score10,ROUND(AVG(SCORE11),2) as score11,ROUND(AVG(SCORE12),2) as score12,ROUND(AVG(SCORE1),2) as score13, ROUND(AVG(SCORE14),2) as score14,ROUND(AVG(SCORE15),2) as score15,ROUND(AVG(SCORE16),2) as score16,ROUND(AVG(SCORE17),2) as score17,ROUND(AVG(SCORE18),2) as score18,ROUND(AVG(SCORE19),2) as score19 ,ROUND(AVG(SCORE20),2) as score20,ROUND((AVG(score1)+AVG(score2)+AVG(score3))/3,2)as avg1 ,ROUND((AVG(score6)+AVG(score4)+AVG(score5))/3,2)as avg2,ROUND((AVG(score10)+AVG(score7)+AVG(score8)+AVG(score9))/4,2)as avg3,ROUND((AVG(score11)+AVG(score12))/2,2)as avg4 ,ROUND((AVG(score17)+AVG(score13)+AVG(score14)+AVG(score15)+AVG(score16))/5,2)as avg5,ROUND((AVG(score18)+AVG(score20)+AVG(score19))/3,2)as avg6 FROM PREVENT_SERVICE WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="사후" AND AGE !=0 ORDER BY NAME

SELECT ROUND(AVG(SCORE1),2) as score1,ROUND(AVG(SCORE2),2) as score2, ROUND(AVG(SCORE3),2) as score3, ROUND(AVG(SCORE4),2) as score4, ROUND(AVG(SCORE5),2) as score5,ROUND(AVG(SCORE6),2) as score6, ROUND(AVG(SCORE7),2) as score7,ROUND(AVG(SCORE8),2) as score8,ROUND(AVG(SCORE9),2) as score9,ROUND(AVG(SCORE10),2) as score10,ROUND(AVG(SCORE11),2) as score11,ROUND(AVG(SCORE12),2) as score12,ROUND(AVG(SCORE1),2) as score13, ROUND(AVG(SCORE14),2) as score14,ROUND(AVG(SCORE15),2) as score15,ROUND(AVG(SCORE16),2) as score16,ROUND(AVG(SCORE17),2) as score17,ROUND(AVG(SCORE18),2) as score18,ROUND(AVG(SCORE19),2) as score19 ,ROUND(AVG(SCORE20),2) as score20,ROUND(AVG(SCORE21),2) as score21,ROUND(AVG(SCORE22),2) as score22,ROUND((AVG(score1)+AVG(score2))/2,2)as avg1 ,ROUND((AVG(score3)+AVG(score4)+AVG(score5))/3,2)as avg2,ROUND((AVG(score6)+AVG(score7)+AVG(score8)+AVG(score9))/4,2)as avg3,ROUND((AVG(score10)+AVG(score11)+AVG(score12))/3,2)as avg4 ,ROUND((AVG(score13)+AVG(score14)+AVG(score15)+AVG(score16))/4,2)as avg5,ROUND((AVG(score18)+AVG(score17)+AVG(score19))/3,2)as avg6,ROUND((AVG(score20)+AVG(score21)+AVG(score22))/3,2)as avg7 FROM HEALING_SERVICE WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="사전" AND AGE !=0

SELECT ROUND(AVG(SCORE1),2) as score1,ROUND(AVG(SCORE2),2) as score2, ROUND(AVG(SCORE3),2) as score3, ROUND(AVG(SCORE4),2) as score4, ROUND(AVG(SCORE5),2) as score5,ROUND(AVG(SCORE6),2) as score6, ROUND(AVG(SCORE7),2) as score7,ROUND(AVG(SCORE8),2) as score8,ROUND(AVG(SCORE9),2) as score9,ROUND(AVG(SCORE10),2) as score10,ROUND(AVG(SCORE11),2) as score11,ROUND(AVG(SCORE12),2) as score12,ROUND(AVG(SCORE1),2) as score13, ROUND(AVG(SCORE14),2) as score14,ROUND(AVG(SCORE15),2) as score15,ROUND(AVG(SCORE16),2) as score16,ROUND(AVG(SCORE17),2) as score17,ROUND(AVG(SCORE18),2) as score18,ROUND(AVG(SCORE19),2) as score19 ,ROUND(AVG(SCORE20),2) as score20,ROUND(AVG(SCORE21),2) as score21,ROUND(AVG(SCORE22),2) as score22,ROUND((AVG(score1)+AVG(score2))/2,2)as avg1 ,ROUND((AVG(score3)+AVG(score4)+AVG(score5))/3,2)as avg2,ROUND((AVG(score6)+AVG(score7)+AVG(score8)+AVG(score9))/4,2)as avg3,ROUND((AVG(score10)+AVG(score11)+AVG(score12))/3,2)as avg4 ,ROUND((AVG(score13)+AVG(score14)+AVG(score15)+AVG(score16))/4,2)as avg5,ROUND((AVG(score18)+AVG(score17)+AVG(score19))/3,2)as avg6,ROUND((AVG(score20)+AVG(score21)+AVG(score22))/3,2)as avg7 FROM HEALING_SERVICE WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="사후" AND AGE !=0

SELECT NAME, SEX,AGE,RESIDENCE,JOB,PV,PTCPROGRAM,PAST_STRESS_EXPERIENCE, SCORE1,SCORE2,SCORE3,SCORE4,SCORE5,SCORE6,SCORE7,SCORE8,SCORE9,SCORE1,SCORE10, SCORE11,SCORE12,SCORE13,SCORE14,SCORE15,SCORE16,SCORE17,SCORE18,SCORE19,SCORE20,SCORE21,SCORE22, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2)/2,1)as avg1,ROUND((ps.SCORE3+ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5)/3,1)as avg2,ROUND((ps.SCORE6+ps.SCORE7+ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9)/4,1)as avg3, ROUND((ps.SCORE10+ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12)/3,1)as avg4,ROUND((ps.SCORE13+ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16)/4,1)as avg5, ROUND((ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE17+ps.SCORE18)/3,1)as avg6, ROUND((ps.SCORE22+ps.SCORE20+ps.SCORE21)/3,1)as avg7 FROM HEALING_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="사전" AND AGE !=0 ORDER BY NAME

SELECT NAME, SEX,AGE,RESIDENCE,JOB,PV,PTCPROGRAM,PAST_STRESS_EXPERIENCE, SCORE1,SCORE2,SCORE3,SCORE4,SCORE5,SCORE6,SCORE7,SCORE8,SCORE9,SCORE1,SCORE10, SCORE11,SCORE12,SCORE13,SCORE14,SCORE15,SCORE16,SCORE17,SCORE18,SCORE19,SCORE20,SCORE21,SCORE22, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2)/2,1)as avg1,ROUND((ps.SCORE3+ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5)/3,1)as avg2,ROUND((ps.SCORE6+ps.SCORE7+ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9)/4,1)as avg3, ROUND((ps.SCORE10+ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12)/3,1)as avg4,ROUND((ps.SCORE13+ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16)/4,1)as avg5, ROUND((ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE17+ps.SCORE18)/3,1)as avg6, ROUND((ps.SCORE22+ps.SCORE20+ps.SCORE21)/3,1)as avg7 FROM HEALING_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="사후" AND AGE !=0 ORDER BY NAME

SELECT OPENDAY,NAME,AGE,RESIDENCE,JOB,PV,PAST_STRESS_EXPERIENCE,COUNSEL_CONTENTS,SEX, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2)/2,2)as score1,ROUND((ps.SCORE3+ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5)/3,2)as score2,ROUND((ps.SCORE6+ps.SCORE7)/2,2)as score3, ROUND((ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9+ps.SCORE10)/3,2)as score4, ROUND((ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12+ps.SCORE13)/3,2)as score5, ROUND((ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16+ps.SCORE17)/4,2)as score6, ROUND((ps.SCORE18+ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE20+ps.SCORE21+ps.SCORE22+ps.SCORE23)/6,2)as score7, ROUND((ps.SCORE24+ps.SCORE25+ps.SCORE26)/3,2)as score8, ROUND((ps.SCORE27+ps.SCORE28+ps.SCORE29)/3,2)as score9, ROUND((ps.SCORE30+ps.SCORE31+ps.SCORE32+ps.SCORE33+ps.SCORE34+ps.SCORE35)/6,2)as score10, ROUND((ps.SCORE36+ps.SCORE37+ps.SCORE38)/3,2)as score11,ROUND((ps.SCORE39+ps.SCORE40+ps.SCORE41+ps.SCORE42)/4,2)as score12, ROUND((ps.SCORE43+ps.SCORE44)/2,2)as score13,ROUND((ps.SCORE45+ps.SCORE46+ps.SCORE47)/3,2)as score14,ROUND((ps.SCORE48+ps.SCORE49+ps.SCORE50)/3,2)as score15 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE51+ps.SCORE52+ps.SCORE53+ps.SCORE54)/4,2)as score16 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE55+ps.SCORE56+ps.SCORE57)/3,2)as score17,ROUND((ps.SCORE58+ps.SCORE59+ps.SCORE60)/3,2)as score18 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE61+ps.SCORE62)/2,2)as score19 FROM COUNSEL_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="사전" AND AGE !=0 ORDER BY NAME

SELECT OPENDAY,NAME,AGE,RESIDENCE,JOB,PV,PAST_STRESS_EXPERIENCE,COUNSEL_CONTENTS,SEX, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2)/2,2)as score1,ROUND((ps.SCORE3+ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5)/3,2)as score2,ROUND((ps.SCORE6+ps.SCORE7)/2,2)as score3, ROUND((ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9+ps.SCORE10)/3,2)as score4, ROUND((ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12+ps.SCORE13)/3,2)as score5, ROUND((ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16+ps.SCORE17)/4,2)as score6, ROUND((ps.SCORE18+ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE20+ps.SCORE21+ps.SCORE22+ps.SCORE23)/6,2)as score7, ROUND((ps.SCORE24+ps.SCORE25+ps.SCORE26)/3,2)as score8, ROUND((ps.SCORE27+ps.SCORE28+ps.SCORE29)/3,2)as score9, ROUND((ps.SCORE30+ps.SCORE31+ps.SCORE32+ps.SCORE33+ps.SCORE34+ps.SCORE35)/6,2)as score10, ROUND((ps.SCORE36+ps.SCORE37+ps.SCORE38)/3,2)as score11,ROUND((ps.SCORE39+ps.SCORE40+ps.SCORE41+ps.SCORE42)/4,2)as score12, ROUND((ps.SCORE43+ps.SCORE44)/2,2)as score13,ROUND((ps.SCORE45+ps.SCORE46+ps.SCORE47)/3,2)as score14,ROUND((ps.SCORE48+ps.SCORE49+ps.SCORE50)/3,2)as score15 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE51+ps.SCORE52+ps.SCORE53+ps.SCORE54)/4,2)as score16 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE55+ps.SCORE56+ps.SCORE57)/3,2)as score17,ROUND((ps.SCORE58+ps.SCORE59+ps.SCORE60)/3,2)as score18 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE61+ps.SCORE62)/2,2)as score19 FROM COUNSEL_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="중간" AND AGE !=0 ORDER BY NAME

SELECT OPENDAY,NAME,AGE,RESIDENCE,JOB,PV,PAST_STRESS_EXPERIENCE,COUNSEL_CONTENTS,SEX, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2)/2,2)as score1,ROUND((ps.SCORE3+ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5)/3,2)as score2,ROUND((ps.SCORE6+ps.SCORE7)/2,2)as score3, ROUND((ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9+ps.SCORE10)/3,2)as score4, ROUND((ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12+ps.SCORE13)/3,2)as score5, ROUND((ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16+ps.SCORE17)/4,2)as score6, ROUND((ps.SCORE18+ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE20+ps.SCORE21+ps.SCORE22+ps.SCORE23)/6,2)as score7, ROUND((ps.SCORE24+ps.SCORE25+ps.SCORE26)/3,2)as score8, ROUND((ps.SCORE27+ps.SCORE28+ps.SCORE29)/3,2)as score9, ROUND((ps.SCORE30+ps.SCORE31+ps.SCORE32+ps.SCORE33+ps.SCORE34+ps.SCORE35)/6,2)as score10, ROUND((ps.SCORE36+ps.SCORE37+ps.SCORE38)/3,2)as score11,ROUND((ps.SCORE39+ps.SCORE40+ps.SCORE41+ps.SCORE42)/4,2)as score12, ROUND((ps.SCORE43+ps.SCORE44)/2,2)as score13,ROUND((ps.SCORE45+ps.SCORE46+ps.SCORE47)/3,2)as score14,ROUND((ps.SCORE48+ps.SCORE49+ps.SCORE50)/3,2)as score15 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE51+ps.SCORE52+ps.SCORE53+ps.SCORE54)/4,2)as score16 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE55+ps.SCORE56+ps.SCORE57)/3,2)as score17,ROUND((ps.SCORE58+ps.SCORE59+ps.SCORE60)/3,2)as score18 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE61+ps.SCORE62)/2,2)as score19 FROM COUNSEL_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} AND PV="사후" AND AGE !=0 ORDER BY NAME
SELECT NAME,AGE,SESSION FROM COUNSEL_SERVICE WHERE AGENCY = #{agency} ORDER BY NAME

SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score1,0)),2),0) as score1,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score2,0)),2),0) as score2, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score3,0)),2),0) as score3, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score4,0)),2),0) as score4, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score5,0)),2),0) as score5, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score6,0)),2),0) as score6,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score7,0)),2),0) as score7,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score8,0)),2),0) as score8,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score9,0)),2),0) as score9,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score10,0)),2),0) as score10,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score11,0)),2),0) as score11, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score12,0)),2),0) as score12, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score13,0)),2),0) as score13, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score14,0)),2),0) as score14, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score15,0)),2),0) as score15,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score16,0)),2),0) as score16,IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score17,0)),2),0) as score17, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(nullif(score18,0)),2),0) as score18 FROM SERVICE_ENV_SATISFACTION WHERE AGENCY LIKE #{agency} AND SEX LIKE #{sex} AND AGE LIKE #{age} AND RESIDENCE LIKE #{residence} AND JOB LIKE #{job} AND OPENDAY LIKE #{openday}

SELECT NAME,AGE, SCORE1,SCORE2,SCORE3,SCORE4,SCORE5,SCORE6,SCORE7,SCORE8,SCORE9,SCORE1,SCORE10, SCORE11,SCORE12,SCORE13,SCORE14,SCORE15,SCORE16,SCORE17,SCORE18,SCORE19,SCORE20,SCORE21,SCORE22, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2)/2,1)as avg1,ROUND((ps.SCORE3+ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5)/3,1)as avg2,ROUND((ps.SCORE6+ps.SCORE7+ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9)/4,1)as avg3, ROUND((ps.SCORE10+ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12)/3,1)as avg4,ROUND((ps.SCORE13+ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16)/4,1)as avg5, ROUND((ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE17+ps.SCORE18)/3,1)as avg6, ROUND((ps.SCORE22+ps.SCORE20+ps.SCORE21)/3,1)as avg7 FROM HEALING_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY LIKE #{agency} AND SEX LIKE #{sex} AND AGE LIKE #{age} AND RESIDENCE LIKE #{residence} AND JOB LIKE #{job} AND OPENDAY LIKE #{openday} AND pv="사전"

SELECT NAME,AGE, SCORE1,SCORE2,SCORE3,SCORE4,SCORE5,SCORE6,SCORE7,SCORE8,SCORE9,SCORE1,SCORE10, SCORE11,SCORE12,SCORE13,SCORE14,SCORE15,SCORE16,SCORE17,SCORE18,SCORE19,SCORE20,SCORE21,SCORE22, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2)/2,1)as avg1,ROUND((ps.SCORE3+ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5)/3,1)as avg2,ROUND((ps.SCORE6+ps.SCORE7+ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9)/4,1)as avg3, ROUND((ps.SCORE10+ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12)/3,1)as avg4,ROUND((ps.SCORE13+ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16)/4,1)as avg5, ROUND((ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE17+ps.SCORE18)/3,1)as avg6, ROUND((ps.SCORE22+ps.SCORE20+ps.SCORE21)/3,1)as avg7 FROM HEALING_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY LIKE #{agency} AND SEX LIKE #{sex} AND AGE LIKE #{age} AND RESIDENCE LIKE #{residence} AND JOB LIKE #{job} AND OPENDAY LIKE #{openday} AND pv="사후"

SELECT NAME,AGE, ROUND(AVG(SCORE1),2) as score1,ROUND(AVG(SCORE2),2) as score2, ROUND(AVG(SCORE3),2) as score3, ROUND(AVG(SCORE4),2) as score4, ROUND(AVG(SCORE5),2) as score5,ROUND(AVG(SCORE6),2) as score6, ROUND(AVG(SCORE7),2) as score7,ROUND(AVG(SCORE8),2) as score8,ROUND(AVG(SCORE9),2) as score9,ROUND(AVG(SCORE10),2) as score10,ROUND(AVG(SCORE11),2) as score11,ROUND(AVG(SCORE12),2) as score12,ROUND(AVG(SCORE1),2) as score13, ROUND(AVG(SCORE14),2) as score14,ROUND(AVG(SCORE15),2) as score15,ROUND(AVG(SCORE16),2) as score16,ROUND(AVG(SCORE17),2) as score17,ROUND(AVG(SCORE18),2) as score18,ROUND(AVG(SCORE19),2) as score19 ,ROUND(AVG(SCORE20),2) as score20,ROUND(AVG(SCORE21),2) as score21,ROUND(AVG(SCORE22),2) as score22,ROUND((AVG(score1)+AVG(score2))/2,2)as avg1 ,ROUND((AVG(score3)+AVG(score4)+AVG(score5))/3,2)as avg2,ROUND((AVG(score6)+AVG(score7)+AVG(score8)+AVG(score9))/4,2)as avg3,ROUND((AVG(score10)+AVG(score11)+AVG(score12))/3,2)as avg4 ,ROUND((AVG(score13)+AVG(score14)+AVG(score15)+AVG(score16))/4,2)as avg5,ROUND((AVG(score18)+AVG(score17)+AVG(score19))/3,2)as avg6,ROUND((AVG(score20)+AVG(score21)+AVG(score22))/3,2)as avg7 FROM HEALING_SERVICE WHERE AGENCY LIKE #{agency} AND SEX LIKE #{sex} AND AGE LIKE #{age} AND RESIDENCE LIKE #{residence} AND JOB LIKE #{job} AND OPENDAY LIKE #{openday} AND pv="사전"

SELECT NAME,AGE, SCORE1,SCORE2,SCORE3,SCORE4,SCORE5,SCORE6,SCORE7,SCORE8,SCORE9,SCORE1,SCORE10, SCORE11,SCORE12,SCORE13,SCORE14,SCORE15,SCORE16,SCORE17,SCORE18,SCORE19,SCORE20, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2+ps.SCORE3)/3,2)as avg1,ROUND((ps.SCORE6+ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5)/3,2)as avg2,ROUND((ps.SCORE10+ps.SCORE7+ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9)/4,2)as avg3, ROUND((ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12)/2,1)as avg4,ROUND((ps.SCORE13+ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16+ps.SCORE17)/5,2)as avg5, ROUND((ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE20+ps.SCORE18)/3,1)as avg6 FROM PREVENT_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY LIKE #{agency} AND SEX LIKE #{sex} AND AGE LIKE #{age} AND RESIDENCE LIKE #{residence} AND JOB LIKE #{job} AND OPENDAY LIKE #{openday} AND pv="사전"

SELECT OPENDAY,NAME,AGE,RESIDENCE,JOB,PV,PAST_STRESS_EXPERIENCE,COUNSEL_CONTENTS,SEX, ROUND((ps.SCORE1+ps.SCORE2)/2,2)as score1,ROUND((ps.SCORE3+ps.SCORE4+ps.SCORE5)/3,2)as score2,ROUND((ps.SCORE6+ps.SCORE7)/2,2)as score3, ROUND((ps.SCORE8+ps.SCORE9+ps.SCORE10)/3,2)as score4, ROUND((ps.SCORE11+ps.SCORE12+ps.SCORE13)/3,2)as score5, ROUND((ps.SCORE14+ps.SCORE15+ps.SCORE16+ps.SCORE17)/4,2)as score6, ROUND((ps.SCORE18+ps.SCORE19+ps.SCORE20+ps.SCORE21+ps.SCORE22+ps.SCORE23)/6,2)as score7, ROUND((ps.SCORE24+ps.SCORE25+ps.SCORE26)/3,2)as score8, ROUND((ps.SCORE27+ps.SCORE28+ps.SCORE29)/3,2)as score9, ROUND((ps.SCORE30+ps.SCORE31+ps.SCORE32+ps.SCORE33+ps.SCORE34+ps.SCORE35)/6,2)as score10, ROUND((ps.SCORE36+ps.SCORE37+ps.SCORE38)/3,2)as score11,ROUND((ps.SCORE39+ps.SCORE40+ps.SCORE41+ps.SCORE42)/4,2)as score12, ROUND((ps.SCORE43+ps.SCORE44)/2,2)as score13,ROUND((ps.SCORE45+ps.SCORE46+ps.SCORE47)/3,2)as score14,ROUND((ps.SCORE48+ps.SCORE49+ps.SCORE50)/3,2)as score15 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE51+ps.SCORE52+ps.SCORE53+ps.SCORE54)/4,2)as score16 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE55+ps.SCORE56+ps.SCORE57)/3,2)as score17,ROUND((ps.SCORE58+ps.SCORE59+ps.SCORE60)/3,2)as score18 ,ROUND((ps.SCORE61+ps.SCORE62)/2,2)as score19 FROM COUNSEL_SERVICE ps WHERE AGENCY LIKE #{agency} AND SEX LIKE #{sex} AND AGE LIKE #{age} AND RESIDENCE LIKE #{residence} AND JOB LIKE #{job} AND OPENDAY LIKE #{openday} AND PV="사전" ORDER BY NAME
